Now Sarah needs to monitor her lust and quench it via sex with leaders in order to get safe action points.

There are two types of actions in the game, safe and dangerous. Safe actions are those in which there is no chance to release the Queen of Blades. The dangerous ones, in turn, have a chance to free her. Each subsequent dangerous action increases the probability.
Not all interactions require points. You can see which actions require them by clicking the corresponding icon next to their choice button.
To get safe action points, Sarah needs to choose a leader who will quench her thirst. Each leader is unique and will do it differently, giving a certain number of safe action points.

Even if the safe actions are over, Sarah can still continue to do lustful actions. Each subsequent one has a chance to release the Queen of Blades. So be careful, try to think through your plan of action in advance. Or wreak havoc by releasing the Queen of Blades.
